parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch pictures in this view

title: IView.IGetSketchPictures
description: Gets all of the sketch pictures imported to this view when a drawing is created from a part.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch pictures in this view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of ISketchPicture s VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use
IView::GetSketchPictureCount
to populate the Count parameter before calling this method. Only sketch pictures orthogonal to this view are returned.
